dart.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to move suddenly and quickly in a particular direction
dart.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Jill darted forward and pulled him away from the fire.
dart.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to look at someone or something very quickly
dart.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Tom darted a terrified glance over his shoulder at his pursuers.
dart.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a small pointed object that is thrown or shot as a weapon, or one that is thrown in the game of darts
dart.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a sudden quick movement in a particular direction
dart.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The prisoner made a dart for the door.
dart.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: a small fold put into a piece of clothing to make it fit better
